remarks: Replacing a finitely supported function over the nonnegative integers by a function over a finite set of sequential integers in a finite group sum.  (Contributed by AV, 9-Oct-2019.)
statement:
nn0gsumfz.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
nn0gsumfz.0 $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
nn0gsumfz.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. CMnd ) $.
nn0gsumfz.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( B ^m NN0 ) ) $.
fsfnn0gsumfsffz.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. NN0 ) $.
fsfnn0gsumfsffz.h $e |- H = ( F |` ( 0 ... S ) ) $.
fsfnn0gsumfsffz $p |- ( ph -> ( A. x e. NN0 ( S < x -> ( F ` x ) = .0. ) -> ( G gsum F ) = ( G gsum H ) ) ) $.
$d .0. x $.
$d F x $.
$d S x $.
